response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and exceptional quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your operations. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12,000. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and my goal to maximize its profitability. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
